decisions.what: Implement state-based logic for checkout checkbox - required only for California
decisions.context: Significant CVR drop after launching checkbox on checkout

decisions.what: Roll out 100% to California and 50/50 split for other states to test checkbox impact
decisions.context: Testing impact of checkout checkbox changes before full rollout

decisions.what: Escalate OTP MVP issue with Cho directly instead of broader escalation
decisions.context: Trying to resolve OTP MVP blockers

decisions.what: Big Rocks for TAM confirmed: Good Chop, The Pets Table, Factor Form, Cross-Selling, Programs with 70% FTE allocation
decisions.context: Budgeting and resource allocation for 2025, with 30% for KTLO including Marketplace and special projects

decisions.what: Focus on maximum 2 OKRs for Q1, specifically OKRs 1 & 2
decisions.context: Team capacity constraints especially after OTP project

decisions.what: Product Team lunch confirmed for Thursday (not moved to Friday)
decisions.context: Meeting new team member, conflicts with Pedro's birthday squad lunch

blockers.description: Venmo checkout failures - 107 people attempted, none successful
blockers.impact: Payment method not functional, blocking Venmo rollout

blockers.description: OTP MVP requires escalation beyond Daniel
blockers.impact: OTP MVP timeline and cross-team coordination

blockers.description: Uncertainty about post-checkout addon capability with charge at checkout
blockers.impact: Potential negative AOV impact if addons cannot be charged separately

blockers.description: NotebookLM access issues for GenAI documentation
blockers.impact: Team unable to review GenAI product management resources

action_items.task: Run pre-post analysis on CVR drop from checkout checkbox
Do quick business case for charge at checkout CVA impact on GoC and TPT
Escalate OTP MVP issue directly with Cho
Review and comment on GenAI Product Manager Cheat Sheet
Submit L&D budget requests (~$4000) before end of year
Discuss OKR KR1 and KR3, consider ARPU metrics
Book Product Team lunch for Thursday

key_context.summary: California-specific checkbox implementation recovered CVR drop. Team considering applying same state-based logic to GoC with phased rollout (100% CA, 50/50 other states).
key_context.relevance: Critical for conversion optimization and potential CAC improvement by reducing empty activation payments

key_context.summary: Evaluating charge at checkout for GoC/TPT which could eliminate empty activation rate but may impact AOV if post-checkout addons cannot be maintained.
key_context.relevance: Major revenue and conversion impact with tradeoffs between CVR uplift and potential AOV decrease

key_context.summary: Venmo experiment showed 107 attempted checkouts with 0% success rate across HF and ER brands.
key_context.relevance: Payment method completely non-functional, blocking expansion of payment options

key_context.topic: 2025 TAM team priorities and resource allocation
key_context.summary: Big Rocks confirmed as Good Chop, TPT, Factor Form, Cross-Selling, Programs with 70% FTE. OTP and special projects in 30% KTLO bucket.
key_context.relevance: Sets strategic direction and capacity constraints for Q1-Q2 planning

key_context.summary: Team narrowing to maximum 2 OKRs for Q1 due to capacity constraints post-OTP, with debate on KRs and whether to focus on ARPU metrics.
key_context.relevance: Defines quarterly goals and success metrics for product team

key_context.summary: TPT planning to migrate users from recipe-determining preferences to single default preference, moving away from preference-based meal selection to pure recipe selection.
key_context.relevance: Major technical change affecting meal selection logic with need for gradual rollout and rollback capability

key_context.summary: Initiative to redefine PM role and workflows with GenAI augmentation, providing tools and processes for problem identification through launch.
key_context.relevance: Organizational transformation of product management practices and daily workflows

key_context.summary: $4000 L&D budget available for courses, books, and tools before year-end, with team interest in GenAI courses.
key_context.relevance: Opportunity for team skill development and tool acquisition

summary: Product team discussing critical CVR optimization through state-based checkout logic, evaluating charge-at-checkout impact, and planning 2025 priorities with focus on Big Rocks (Good Chop, TPT, Factor Form, Cross-Selling, Programs) while managing OTP MVP escalations and narrowing Q1 to 2 OKRs due to capacity constraints.
